dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5085 IH: Don’t Break Up the T-Band Act of 2018
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Engel (for himself, Mr. Zeldin, and Mr. King of New York) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To repeal the section of the Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act of 2012 that requires the Federal Communications Commission to reallocate and auction the T-Band spectrum.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Don’t Break Up the T-Band Act of 2018.

section.header: Repeal of requirement to reallocate and auction T-Band spectrum

subsection.text: Section 6103 of the Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act of 2012 (47 U.S.C. 1413) is repealed.
The table of contents in section 1(b) of such Act is amended by striking the item relating to section 6103.
